io.confluent.ksql.api.perf

Class BasePerfRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.api.perf.BasePerfRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InsertsStreamRunner, PullQueryRunner, QueryStreamRunner

    public abstract class BasePerfRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple tool for measuring performance of our API.

    Implement the actual test in a subclass by overriding the abstract methods.

    This tool is a simple rough and ready tool that does not pretend to be a fully fledged performance testing tool. It's really useful for quickly running perf tests in your IDE to get a rough idea of performance and do a first pass of performance tuning parameters - e.g. reactive streams buffer sizes.
